definition: to choke/to stifle/to restrain/to hold back/to hold in (urine)/to hold (one's breath)
to feel suffocated or oppressed/to choke with resentment/to feel injured or resentful
to feel oppressed/to be depressed/to feel dejected
to be unable to repress sth/to be unable to contain oneself
lit. such a fool as to die from holding in one's pee (idiom)/fig. unable to solve a problem due to the inflexibility of one's thinking
pinyin: huo2 ren2 rang4 niao4 bie1 si3

sentences.english: It helps you not be inside so much.
sentences.chinese: 它能帮你不在心里憋太多事情。

sentences.english: The room was so stuffy that one could hardly breathe.
sentences.chinese: 屋里太闷，憋得人透不过气来。

sentences.english: No one is a hero in the plight.
Objectiv To evaluate the effect of the Shuang Huanglian inhaled in the gasping pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价双黄连雾化吸入对喘憋性肺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Even the coconut trees seemed swollen and expectant.
sentences.chinese: 连椰子树都似乎憋得头昏脑胀，巴望能舒上一口气。

sentences.english: This bedroom is too poky for me.
This matter, let QinLang a small in my heart filled a few years, sad for a few years.
sentences.chinese: 这件事，让秦朗一小我在心里憋了几年，忧伤了几年。

sentences.english: My face turns dead with boredom.
sentences.chinese: 我终因无聊厌烦，憋得面呈死色。

sentences.english: He thought two of his ribs might already have cracked from trying not to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他因为要憋住不笑已经憋到两根胁骨都快断掉了。

sentences.english: If one locks up his anger it will only cause trouble later.
sentences.chinese: 把怒气憋在心里，以后反到麻烦。

sentences.english: After 10 seconds of silence , the phone was hang up.
sentences.chinese: 对方憋了10秒种，没说出话来，把电话挂了。

sentences.english: It's just because he's been cooped up all winter.
sentences.chinese: 只不过整个冬天关在屋里憋坏了。

definition: to be unable to repress sth/to be unable to contain oneself
to feel oppressed/to be depressed/to feel dejected
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
half of the day/a long time/quite a while/midair/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel suffocated or oppressed/to choke with resentment/to feel injured or resentful
to get angry/to burn with rage
